T02D1227:31a-1: shr'i he badzra n'a ma s'a dha nam /
T02D1227:31a-3: dpal kye rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D1227:31a-4: dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1227:31a-5: ae wam nyid bzhugs rje bo mgon po bzhi //
T02D1227:31a-6: dang po tha ma dbus las rnam par grol //
T02D1227:31a-7: rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1227:31a-8: bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rgan pa rnams kyi rkang pa la /
T02D1227:31a-9: dad pa spyod pas phyag btsal nas bri /
T02D1227:31a-10: dang por gnas bstan par bya ba ni /
T02D1227:31b-0: shing gcig @31b gam ni dur khrod du //
T02D1227:31b-1: de bzhin ma mo'i khyim dag gam //
T02D1227:31b-2: yang na dben pa'am bas mtha' ru //
T02D1227:31b-3: der ni bsgom pa bzang bar gsungs //
T02D1227:31b-4: zhes 'byung bas na gnas der ram /
T02D1227:31b-5: rang nyams dga' ba'i gnas su 'dug nas /
T02D1227:31b-6: sems rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rnal 'byor mnyam pa nyid du byas nas //
T02D1227:31b-7: nub mo rang gi snying gar 'dug nas //
T02D1227:31b-9: de'i steng du thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can yi ge h'u%/
T02D1227:31b-10: nam mkha' la bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mthong nas /
T02D1227:31b-11: lha mo brgyad rgyan gyis brgyan pa spros nas mchod pa /
T02D1227:31b-12: goo r'i zla ba'i snod can /
T02D1227:31b-13: tsoo r'i nyi ma'i snod can /
T02D1227:31b-14: bett'a l'i dri chu'i snod can /
T02D1227:31b-15: ghasma r'i sman gyi snod can //
T02D1227:31b-17: sa pa r'i bdud rtsi'i snod can //
T02D1227:31b-20: dombi n'i reg bya dbyer med pa'i chags pa chen po dang rjes su chags par byed /
T02D1227:31b-21: de nas phyi'i mchod pa dang /
T02D1227:31b-23: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1227:31b-24: de nas dang po byams pa dang /
T02D1227:31b-27: bzhi pa btang snyoms su bya'o //
T02D1227:31b-28: de nas sems stong pa nyid du byed pa //
T02D1227:31b-29: 'khor ba bdag tu 'dzin pa med par bya /
T02D1227:31b-30: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1227:31b-31: de nas yi ge ram las sngon du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom /
T02D1227:31b-32: de'i steng du yi ge h'um las rdo rje /
T02D1227:31b-34: de las 'od zer 'phros pas bla re dang /
T02D1227:31b-37: de'i dbus su nam mkha'i dbyings kyi 'byung gnas su
T02D1227:31b-38: bsgom pa ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor me'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1227:31b-41: de'i steng du bhr'um las 'khor lo lte ba la
T02D1227:31b-42: bhr'um bhr'um dang 'khor lo gnyis dbyer med pa las
T02D1227:31b-43: rnam par snang mdzad de dang 'byung bzhi'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1227:31b-45: chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dbus su gzhal yas khang du gyur /
T02D1227:31b-46: gzhal yas khang thog gcig pa //
T02D1227:31b-47: sgo bzhi pa tva ran bzhis mdzes pa /
T02D1227:31b-48: me tog sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can /
T02D1227:31b-49: de'i dbus su a'a li las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1227:32a-2: zla ba me long lta bu'i ye shes nyi ma
T02D1227:32a-3: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dbus su h'um las
T02D1227:32a-4: rdo rje so sor rtog pa'i ye shes /
T02D1227:32a-5: gcig tu 'dres pa'i ngo bo bya ba grub pa'i ye shes /
T02D1227:32a-6: rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su gyur pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1227:32a-7: 'dres pa yi ge h'u% las rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1227:32a-8: de mngon par byang chub pa lngas sku bskyed pa'o
T02D1227:32a-9: // zhal dang phyag mtshan yab dang sras su mthun pa /
T02D1227:32a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' rin chen zla ba'i gzugs can /
T02D1227:32a-11: phyag bcu drug zhal brgyad zhabs bzhi dga' bar byed
T02D1227:32a-12: pa phyag dang po gnyis kyis bdag med ma la
T02D1227:32a-13: 'khyud pa / thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems zla ba /
T02D1227:32a-14: goo r'i brgya byin phyogs su gnas /
T02D1227:32a-15: tsoo r'i yi dags phyogs su gnas /
T02D1227:32a-16: bett'a l'i chu bdag phyogs su gnas /
T02D1227:32a-17: ghasma r'i gnod sbyin phyogs su gnas /
T02D1227:32a-19: gtsigs pa'i gzugs can sgor gnas pa'o //
T02D1227:32a-20: pukka s'i 'joms pa'i gzugs can dbang ldan grvar gnas /
T02D1227:32a-21: sa ba r'i me'i grvar gnas /
T02D1227:32a-22: tsanda l'i bden bral gyi grvar gnas /
T02D1227:32a-23: dombi n'i rlung gi grvar gnas pa'o //
T02D1227:32a-24: ga% tsa% ba% gha% ba% sa% la% da% sa bon las sku rdzogs nas dbyung bar bya //
T02D1227:32a-25: goo r'i phyag g-yas na gri gug g-yon na nya /
T02D1227:32a-26: tsoo r'i g-yas na rde'u chung /
T02D1227:32a-27: g-yon na phag / gha sma r'i g-yas na sbrul /
T02D1227:32a-29: pu kka s'i g-yas seng ge /
T02D1227:32a-31: sa ba r'i g-yas na dge slong /
T02D1227:32a-36: g-yon sdigs mdzug goo r'i kha dog nag mo /
T02D1227:32a-42: tsanda l'i nam mkha'i mdog /dombi n'i kha dog sna tshogs thams cad spyan gsum pa /
T02D1227:32a-44: phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa thams cad bzhengs nas /
T02D1227:32a-46: thams cad kyang phyag gnyis pa /
T02D1227:32a-54: goo r'i la sogs pa rnams kyi gdan no //
T02D1227:32b-0: @32b de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum dang bcas pa 'dod chags chen pos zhu nas /
T02D1227:32b-1: de nas lha mo bzhis bskul ba /
T02D1227:32b-2: sna tshogs glu yis rab tu mchod //
T02D1227:32b-3: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i thugs rje'i yid //
T02D1227:32b-4: pukka s'i ni bdag la skyobs //
T02D1227:32b-5: bde ba chen po sbyor 'dod pas //
T02D1227:32b-6: stong pa'i rang bzhin bsal te bzhengs //
T02D1227:32b-7: stong pa'i rang bzhin bsal nas ni //
T02D1227:32b-8: sa ba r'i la dngos grub stsol //
T02D1227:32b-9: gal te gson par mchi bzhed na //
T02D1227:32b-10: dgyes pa'i rdo rje bzhengs su gsol //
T02D1227:32b-11: tsanda l'i ni bdag gis su //
T02D1227:32b-12: mthong ba med nas gsol ba yi //
T02D1227:32b-13: ci yi phyir na stong par bzhugs //
T02D1227:32b-14: sngon smon bzhin du dpa' bo rol //
T02D1227:32b-15: bdag ni do mbi'i mtshan ma med //
T02D1227:32b-16: khyod kyi sems ni shes pa ste //
T02D1227:32b-17: thugs rje med pa de mi rung //
T02D1227:32b-18: sgyu 'phrul lta bur bzhengs su gsol //
T02D1227:32b-19: dang po stong pa'i byang chub sems //
T02D1227:32b-20: gnyis pa la ni sa bon 'byung //
T02D1227:32b-21: gsum pa la ni gzugs rdzogs te //
T02D1227:32b-22: bzhi pa la ni yig 'bru dgod //
T02D1227:32b-23: bdag po dga' ma sa bon gnyis //
T02D1227:32b-24: bar ma 'jigs pa sngon po gnyis //
T02D1227:32b-25: aam h'um gnyis kyi 'od zer las //
T02D1227:32b-26: rdo rje chen po bzhengs pa'o //
T02D1227:32b-27: lha yi gzugs su 'phros nas ni //
T02D1227:32b-28: nam mkha'i khams ni yongs gang pa'o //
T02D1227:32b-29: snying gar aam h'um la bsdus nas //
T02D1227:32b-31: zhe sdang chen po'i rang bzhin gyur //
T02D1227:32b-32: zhabs bzhi sa la mnan pa yis //
T02D1227:32b-33: lha dang lha min 'jigs par byed //
T02D1227:32b-34: kha dog nag po 'jigs par byed //
T02D1227:32b-35: bdag med ma la bde ba ster //
T02D1227:32b-36: rtog pa med pa'i bde ba rnyed //
T02D1227:32b-37: rtog pa med pa'i rang bzhin gzugs //
T02D1227:32b-38: bdud bzhi rim par zhabs kyis mnan //
T02D1227:32b-40: mgo bo'i phreng ba rdzogs par bya //
T02D1227:32b-41: nyi ma'i gdan la gar thabs byed //
T02D1227:32b-42: sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor gnas //
T02D1227:32b-43: kha dog nag po 'jigs par byed //
T02D1227:32b-44: dang po zhal ni nag po che //
T02D1227:32b-45: g-yas kyi zhal ni zla ltar dkar //
T02D1227:32b-46: g-yon gyi zhal ni dmar po 'jigs //
T02D1227:32b-47: steng gi sngon po gtsigs pa'i zhal //
T02D1227:32b-48: nyi shu rtsa bzhi spyan dang ldan //
T02D1227:32b-49: zhal rnams gzhan ni nag po'o //
T02D1227:32b-50: h'u% zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin cing //
T02D1227:33a-2: smin ma skra yengs ser po yin //
T02D1227:33a-3: phyag rgya lnga yis sku la brgyan //
T02D1227:33a-4: spyan ni lta stangs khro bor blta //
T02D1227:33a-5: lo ni bcu drug tsam gyi tshad //
T02D1227:33a-6: glang po rta dang bong bu dang //
T02D1227:33a-7: ba lang rnga mo mi dag dang //
T02D1227:33a-8: byi la dang ni seng ge dang //
T02D1227:33a-9: g-yas kyi phyag na thod pa brgyad //
T02D1227:33a-10: de rnams rim pa bzhin du gzhag / sa yi lha dang chu yi lha //
T02D1227:33a-11: me yi lha dang rlung gi lha //
T02D1227:33a-12: zla ba'i lha dang nyi ma'i lha //
T02D1227:33a-13: gshin rje lha dang nor sbyin no //
T02D1227:33a-14: g-yon pa'i phyag na bandha brgyad //
T02D1227:33a-15: de rnams rim par dgod pa'o //
T02D1227:33a-16: sgeg pa dpa' ba 'jigs su rung ba dang /
T02D1227:33a-17: rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed pa dang //
T02D1227:33a-18: snying rje rngam dang zhi ba la sogs pa //
T02D1227:33a-19: 'bar ba'i gar dgu ro dang ldan //
T02D1227:33a-20: shr'i ni ye shes mi gnyis pa //
T02D1227:33a-21: he ni rgyu sogs rnam par spangs //
T02D1227:33a-22: ru ni tshogs dang bral ba ste //
T02D1227:33a-23: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o //
T02D1227:33a-24: aom dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1227:33a-25: mig gnyis la ni gti mug rdo rje'o //
T02D1227:33a-26: rna ba la zhe sdang rdo rje'o //
T02D1227:33a-27: sna la ser sna rdo rje'o /
T02D1227:33a-29: reg bya la phrag dog rdo rje'o //
T02D1227:33a-30: yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1227:33a-31: sa la spyod ma lus rdo rje ma //
T02D1227:33a-32: mkha' la spyod ma gsung rdo rje ma //
T02D1227:33a-33: snying gi dbus na gnas pa ni bdag med ma'o //
T02D1227:33a-34: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las //
T02D1227:33a-35: 'od nag po lcags kyu 'dra ba 'phros pas //
T02D1227:33a-36: khams gsum gyi sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas //
T02D1227:33a-37: mchod pa lha mo brgyad dag gis bya'o //
T02D1227:33a-38: de nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1227:33a-39: aom aa bhi shinytsa tu m'am sarba badzra ta th'a ga ta /
T02D1227:33a-40: rdzogs nas thams cad he ru ka / sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur mdzad //
T02D1227:33a-41: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin chu //
T02D1227:33a-42: bdud rtsi bum pas dbang bskur ro //
T02D1227:33a-43: de nas me tog gi char dang /
T02D1227:33a-44: ras dang tsandan gyi phye ma dang /
T02D1227:33a-45: gur gum char du phab pas /
T02D1227:33a-46: nam mkha'i khams sna tshogs pa'i sgras gang nas /
T02D1227:33a-47: sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyis mchod pa byas nas /
T02D1227:33a-48: lo tsa na la sogs pa yis //
T02D1227:33a-49: rdo rje'i glus kyang stod par byed //
T02D1227:33a-50: de ltar dbang bskur zin nas /
T02D1227:33a-51: mi bskyed pa 'khor lo'i gzugs can /
T02D1227:33b-0: rna ba snang ba mtha' yas kyi @33b bdag nyid //
T02D1227:33b-2: ska rags don yod grub pa /
T02D1227:33b-3: gdu bu rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin du dran par bya'o //
T02D1227:33b-4: phyag rgya lnga rnam par dag pa rigs lnga'o //
T02D1227:33b-5: snying rje rnam par dag pa spyan dmar po /
T02D1227:33b-6: byams pa rnam par dag pa mdog nag po /
T02D1227:33b-7: byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa pags pa /
T02D1227:33b-8: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnam par dag pa rus pa /
T02D1227:33b-9: phyag rgya rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas lnga'o //
T02D1227:33b-10: gdug pa'i sems can gdul ba'i phyir //
T02D1227:33b-12: sha rnam par dag pa pukka s'i'o //
T02D1227:33b-13: khrag rnam par dag pa sa ba r'i'o //
T02D1227:33b-14: byang chub rnam par dag pa tsanda l'i'o //
T02D1227:33b-15: rkang rnam par dag pa dombi n'i'o //
T02D1227:33b-16: rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pa zhal brgyad /
T02D1227:33b-17: lus ngag yid gsum rnam par dag pa spyan gsum /
T02D1227:33b-18: stong pa bcu drug rnam par dag pa phyag bcu
T02D1227:33b-19: drug / bdud bzhi rnam par dag pa zhabs bzhi
T02D1227:33b-20: / de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D1227:33b-24: goo r'i la sogs pa phyag rgya bzhi'o //
T02D1227:33b-25: sa rnam par dag pa pukka s'i'o //
T02D1227:33b-26: chu rnam par dag pas ba r'i'o //
T02D1227:33b-27: me rnam par dag pa tsanda l'i'o //
T02D1227:33b-28: rlung rnam par dag pa dombi n'i ru gsungs so //
T02D1227:33b-29: dus gsum du gnas pa las langs nas lha'i gzugs su bya'o //
T02D1227:33b-30: nyon mongs pa med na sngags kyi bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D1227:33b-31: aom de ba pi tsu badzra h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a //
T02D1227:33b-32: bya ba thams cad he ru ka'i gzugs su bya ste /
T02D1227:33b-33: dngos grub gang 'dod kyang rung ste /
T02D1227:33b-34: he ru ka'i gzugs su bya'o //
T02D1227:33b-35: zla ba drug tu 'dug na dngos grub 'byung ste /
T02D1227:33b-37: sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1227:33b-38: bsgul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin //
T02D1227:33b-39: brjod pa thams cad sngags yin te /
T02D1227:33b-40: he ru ka ni gnas pa ni //
T02D1227:33b-41: rnam shes yang dag shes pa yin //
T02D1227:33b-42: rgyud las sgrub thabs bsdus pa'o //
T02D1227:33b-43: shes dang mi shes mi dpogs pas //
T02D1227:33b-44: zab mo tshul ni gsal byed pa //
T02D1227:33b-45: shes rab 'o ma'i rgya mtsho las //
T02D1227:33b-46: skad cig man ngag srubs shing gis //
T02D1227:33b-47: slob dpon bde ba'i man ngag gis //
T02D1227:33b-48: bsdus pas bdud rtsi za ba ltar //
T02D1227:34a-2: he ru ka yi sgrub thabs 'di //
T02D1227:34a-3: legs par gsal bar byas pa ni //
T02D1227:34a-4: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud las brtsams //
T02D1227:34a-5: de bzhin gsungs pa'i rim pa yis //
T02D1227:34a-6: bdag gi bsod nams 'di dang ni //
T02D1227:34a-7: dpal gyi sngags kyi rim brjod pas //
T02D1227:34a-8: yin pa'i byang chub man dge bas //
T02D1227:34a-9: myur bar sems can grol gyur cig / bla ma dang ni pha ma dang //
T02D1227:34a-10: 'khor mi rnams kyis thos dga' ba //
T02D1227:34a-11: byang chub snying por byas pa 'di //
T02D1227:34a-12: sngon du dran pa'i ye shes kyis //
T02D1227:34a-13: de nyid brjod par byas pa 'dis //
T02D1227:34a-14: dpal gyi yid ni rnyed par shog / he badzra'i
T02D1227:34a-15: sgrub thabs slob dpon byang chub snying pos mdzad pa
T02D1227:34a-17: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'am pam ka ra tsandra dang /
